function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased local temperatures due to urbanization leading to higher incidence of mosquito-borne diseases such as dengue, Zika, and yellow fever","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission, increased health burden, and potential outbreaks in urban areas","Mitigation":"Implementing mosquito control measures, reducing urban heat island effect, and promoting sustainable urban planning","Technologies":"Mosquito traps, urban green spaces, building design for natural ventilation, and climate-resilient infrastructure","People":"Urban residents, particularly those living in densely populated areas","Owner":"Local government, urban planners, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Climate-associated changes in precipitation disproportionately affecting urban and rural environments in terms of mosquito oviposition sites","Impact":"Unequal distribution of mosquito breeding sites, leading to varied disease exposure in urban and rural areas","Mitigation":"Implementing water management strategies, reducing stagnant water in urban areas, and promoting effective waste disposal","Technologies":"Smart drainage systems, urban green infrastructure, and water recycling technologies","People":"Urban and rural residents, especially those living in areas prone to water accumulation","Owner":"Local government, environmental agencies, community organizations"},{"Description":"Challenges in estimating urban mosquito species distributions and abundance, leading to poor estimation of urban disease exposure","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of disease risk and potential underestimation of health threats in urban areas","Mitigation":"Conducting fine-scale urban mosquito surveillance, improving urban disease mapping, and enhancing data collection in urban environments","Technologies":"GIS mapping, remote sensing technology, and geospatial data analysis","People":"Researchers, public health agencies, and urban planners","Owner":"Government research agencies, public health organizations, and academic institutions"}]}
